import './checkout.styles.scss' import { CartContext } from '../context/cart.context' import { useContext } from 'react' import CheckoutItem from '../checkout-item/checkout-item.component' const Checkout = () => { const {cartItems, total} = useContext(CartContext) return (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(cartItem => { return }) } Total: {total}
) } export default Checkout
